name: Tilting Ship
description:
Tilting Ship is a casual game, where you attempt to evade upcoming obstacles.
(We recommend the Mobile release ^^)

[Windows / Standalone]
You can move the ship by using:
- A (Left) and D (Right) Keys
- Left Arrow (Left) and Right Arrow (Right)

[Mobile]
You can move the ship by:
- Tilting your screen left or right
- Tap the left or right side of your screen
